text: Htin Kyaw (, or ; born 20 July 1946) is a Burmese politician, writer and scholar who served as the ninth President of Myanmar from 30 March 2016 to 21 March 2018. He was the first elected president to hold the office with no ties to the military since the 1962 coup d'Ã©tat. The second son of scholar Min Thu Wun, Htin Kyaw had held various positions in the education, planning and treasury ministries in prior governments. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Academics Category:Asian writers Category:Presidents of Myanmar
title: Htin Kyaw
